queries.sql: SELECT `b`.`product_id`, `b`.`product_name`, sum(a.quantity) as quantity, sum(a.total_price) as sales_amount, `c`.`date` FROM `invoice_details` `a` JOIN `invoice` `c` ON `c`.`invoice_id` = `a`.`invoice_id` JOIN `product_information` `b` ON `b`.`product_id` = `a`.`product_id` WHERE MONTH(c.date) = '06' GROUP BY `a`.`product_id` ORDER BY `quantity` DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT COUNT(*) AS `numrows` FROM ( SELECT `a`.`product_name`, `a`.`generic_name`, `a`.`strength`, `b`.`manufacturer_name`, ((select ifnull(sum(quantity), 0) from product_purchase_details where product_id= `a`.`product_id`)-(select ifnull(sum(quantity), 0) from invoice_details where product_id= `a`.`product_id`) + (select ifnull(sum(ret_qty), 0) from product_return where product_id= `a`.`product_id` AND usablity = 1) - (select ifnull(sum(ret_qty), 0) from product_return where product_id= `a`.`product_id` AND usablity = 2)) as 'stock' FROM `product_information` `a` JOIN `manufacturer_information` `b` ON `b`.`manufacturer_id` = `a`.`manufacturer_id` GROUP BY `a`.`product_id` HAVING `stock` < 10 ) CI_count_all_results

SELECT `a`.*, `b`.`manufacturer_name`, `a`.`product_name`, `a`.`generic_name`, `a`.`strength`, ((select ifnull(sum(quantity), 0) from product_purchase_details where product_id= `a`.`product_id`)-(select ifnull(sum(quantity), 0) from invoice_details where product_id= `a`.`product_id`) + (select ifnull(sum(ret_qty), 0) from product_return where product_id= `a`.`product_id` AND usablity = 1) - (select ifnull(sum(ret_qty), 0) from product_return where product_id= `a`.`product_id` AND usablity = 2)) as 'stock' FROM `product_information` `a` LEFT JOIN `manufacturer_information` `b` ON `b`.`manufacturer_id`=`a`.`manufacturer_id` GROUP BY `a`.`product_id` HAVING `stock` < 10 ORDER BY `a`.`product_name` ASC LIMIT 20

SELECT `b`.*, `b`.`expeire_date` as `expdate`, `a`.`product_name`, `a`.`strength`, ((select ifnull(sum(quantity), 0) from product_purchase_details where product_id= `a`.`product_id`)-(select ifnull(sum(quantity), 0) from invoice_details where product_id= `a`.`product_id`) + (select ifnull(sum(ret_qty), 0) from product_return where product_id= `a`.`product_id` AND usablity = 1) - (select ifnull(sum(ret_qty), 0) from product_return where product_id= `a`.`product_id` AND usablity = 2)) as 'stock' FROM `product_information` `a` LEFT JOIN `product_purchase_details` `b` ON `b`.`product_id`=`a`.`product_id` WHERE `b`.`expeire_date` <= '2021-06-18' GROUP BY `b`.`batch_id`, `a`.`product_id` HAVING `stock` >0 LIMIT 20

SELECT COUNT(*) AS `numrows` FROM ( SELECT `b`.*, `a`.`product_name`, `a`.`strength`, ((select ifnull(sum(quantity), 0) from product_purchase_details where product_id= `a`.`product_id`)-(select ifnull(sum(quantity), 0) from invoice_details where product_id= `a`.`product_id`) + (select ifnull(sum(ret_qty), 0) from product_return where product_id= `a`.`product_id` AND usablity = 1) - (select ifnull(sum(ret_qty), 0) from product_return where product_id= `a`.`product_id` AND usablity = 2)) as 'stock' FROM `product_information` `a` LEFT JOIN `product_purchase_details` `b` ON `b`.`product_id`=`a`.`product_id` WHERE `b`.`expeire_date` <= '2021-06-18' GROUP BY `b`.`batch_id`, `a`.`product_id` HAVING `stock` >0 ) CI_count_all_results

SELECT COUNT(*) AS `numrows` FROM ( SELECT `b`.*, `a`.`product_name`, `a`.`strength`, ((select ifnull(sum(quantity), 0) from product_purchase_details where product_id= `a`.`product_id`)-(select ifnull(sum(quantity), 0) from invoice_details where product_id= `a`.`product_id`)) as 'stock' FROM `product_information` `a` LEFT JOIN `product_purchase_details` `b` ON `b`.`product_id`=`a`.`product_id` WHERE `b`.`expeire_date` <= '2021-06-18' GROUP BY `b`.`batch_id`, `a`.`product_id` HAVING `stock` >0 ) CI_count_all_results

SELECT COUNT(*) AS `numrows` FROM ( SELECT `a`.`product_name`, `a`.`generic_name`, `a`.`strength`, `b`.`manufacturer_name`, ((select ifnull(sum(quantity), 0) from product_purchase_details where product_id= `a`.`product_id`)-(select ifnull(sum(quantity), 0) from invoice_details where product_id= `a`.`product_id`)) as 'stock' FROM `product_information` `a` JOIN `manufacturer_information` `b` ON `b`.`manufacturer_id` = `a`.`manufacturer_id` GROUP BY `a`.`product_id` HAVING `stock` < 10 ) CI_count_all_results
